Issue.summary: Check if RAFT election is finished and OSN is ready to accept transactions
Issue.description: It takes some time for RAFT nodes to start accepting transactions when there are multiple orderer organizations each with multiple ordering nodes. I want to know if there is any way to constantly check the readiness of nodes. Right after they're ready to accept transactions, I want to create a channel and join peers. I checked orderers' logs but I can't find a way to automate the process. I also looked at Prometheus metrics. Apparently in Fabric v2.0 there is a way to check active nodes in the channel by reading consensus_etcdraft_active_nodes info from orderer's exporter but this isn't the case in Fabric v1.4.6.Â
